body_html:
This may be a camera2 API problem. It wouldn't surprise me if an x86 device like the Xenfone 2 has issues with it.

There's an outstanding PR #8736 to add a fallback to the original camera 1 API on problematic devices -- you might try syncing to that branch and see if it addresses your problem. If it does then we'd like to get it merged, there's just a little bit more refactoring that needs to be done if you have time to fix it up.

body:
This may be a camera2 API problem. It wouldn't surprise me if an x86 device like the Xenfone 2 has issues with it.

There's an outstanding PR #8736 to add a fallback to the original camera 1 API on problematic devices -- you might try syncing to that branch and see if it addresses your problem. If it does then we'd like to get it merged, there's just a little bit more refactoring that needs to be done if you have time to fix it up.
